title: What are some private places for couples in Amravati? - Quora

response.answer_text: I advise you as per my experience that you should go to a talkies or a cafe, which are safe. Well bamboo garden is also a good option. Some places like wadali garden are not safe as sometimes police inqueries you about what is your relation with that girl or boy.
There are some places but not fully known for couple place Maltekdi, Amravati Bamboo Garden Amravati Chhatri Talao Garden, Amravati…. Many cafes are available too..
